name: Amrithaaaa
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
i hope you get everything you deserve, i won't wish for everlasing happyness for you 
        cause that is just unrealistic but i hope whenever you get sad you have strength to stand and shine again, you're a cool human
     keep humaning, i dont specifically like you as a person cause i hate everything about you but i mean . . . tu theek thaak hai ok
         so theek thaak reh and be who what and how you are, and make sure to not forget me after 60 saal bhi
textInChatBox: Hapi budday nigga mf hoe ilysfm blah blah . . .
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special (you're not, i just wanted to try this hehe)
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
